name: The Platinum Life
overview: The experiences of some of the fierce and devoted women behind music's biggest names as they navigate the ups and downs of their relationships, friendships and high-class lifestyles.

episodes.name: Keep It Cute
episodes.overview: Experienced rapper Lola attempts a comeback to her rap career after taking time off to be a mom; Kid Ink's wife Asiah decides to throw an upscale brunch, but her plans are thwarted when Ne-Yo's wife Crystal invites the group to see Jennifer Lopez.

episodes.name: After Thot
episodes.overview: Asiah throws a summer bash after her brunch was derailed; Crystal and Asiah work through their issues, but they hit a snag; Alycia looks to start dating again after a bad breakup; La'Myia is nervous about her post-baby body.

episodes.name: Country Glamour
episodes.overview: Shantel invites a small group to see Nelly perform; Nazanin prepares for a photo shoot to launch her new swimwear line; Lola promotes her upcoming mix tape at legendary radio station Power 106; La'Myia and Shantel face off at dinner.

episodes.name: Pressure Cooker
episodes.overview: Crystal tries to prove she's ready to take her passion for cooking to the next level with a potential business deal; Lola shoots a music video to help launch her official comeback; Shantel visits a fertility doctor.

episodes.name: Gold Chains and Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Asiah plans a pop-up shop event to promote Kid Ink's new merchandise; Nazanin tries to overcome her anxiety about performing while working on a new single; with the support of her husband, Eric Bellinger, La'Myia schedules her breast augmentation.

episodes.name: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.overview: Nazanin starts planning her dream wedding to Miguel, but when she gets overwhelmed, her friends step in and throw a pre-bachelorette party; King Los and Lola set Alycia up on a blind date; Shantel reaches new heights with her Shoe Gummi business.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Asiah invites her friends to accompany her to Cancun while she models for a campaign shoot; things get dicey when someone exposes Crystal for bad-mouthing Asiah's BFF Blanca; Crystal's friends interrupt Asiah's photo shoot.
